description: Kite (カイト Kaito), is the very first Hunter introduced in the story. He is a disciple of Ging Freecss, Gon`s father. After saving Gon from a foxbear on Whale Island, Kite revealed to him the truth about his father. Before he took his leave, Kite left Ging`s Hunter License in Gon`s hands.
name: Kite
